Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows interaction between the grid and the words list. Links together Grid and WordsList objects. Provides and generic method for both graphical and non-graphical mode for placing words and ending the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(Grid grid, WordsList list)
      Creates a new Game object with given Grid and WordsList.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkEnd()
      Returns true if the conditions for ending the game are met.
      void setEnd(java.lang.Runnable end)
      Set the method to run at the end of the game to the provided one.
      boolean setWord(int index, int l, int c, boolean v)
      Get the word at the given index, calls Grid::setWord with it, delete the placed word and end the game if applicable.
      boolean setWord(java.lang.String word, int l, int c, boolean v, java.lang.Runnable callback)
      Calls Grid::setWord, delete the placed word, run callback and end the game if applicable.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(Grid grid,
            WordsList list)
        Creates a new Game object with given Grid and WordsList.
        Parameters:
        list - previously created WordsList object
        grid - previously created Grid object

    • Method Detail

      • checkEnd

        public boolean checkEnd()
        Returns true if the conditions for ending the game are met. Those conditions are either that all words have been placed, or that there is no room left for another word.
        Returns:
        true if the game is finished

      • setWord

        public boolean setWord(java.lang.String word,
                       int l,
                       int c,
                       boolean v,
                       java.lang.Runnable callback)
        Calls Grid::setWord, delete the placed word, run callback and end the game if applicable.
        Parameters:
        word - word to place on the grid
        l - line to begin at
        c - column to begin at
        v - if true, places the word vertically, otherwise places it horizontally
        callback - Runnable functional interface called after a word has been placed and before the end of the game if applicable
        Returns:
        true if the game has ended, false otherwise

      • setWord

        public boolean setWord(int index,
                       int l,
                       int c,
                       boolean v)
        Get the word at the given index, calls Grid::setWord with it, delete the placed word and end the game if applicable.
        Parameters:
        index - index of word to place in words list
        l - line to begin at
        c - column to begin at
        v - if true, places the word vertically, otherwise places it horizontally
        Returns:
        true if the game has ended, false otherwise

      • setEnd

        public void setEnd(java.lang.Runnable end)
        Set the method to run at the end of the game to the provided one.
        Parameters:
        end - Runnable functional interface to call at the end of the game
